name: The Windup Girl
description: 曼谷的發條女孩; Paolo Bacigalupi, 2009; Morning Star, Jul 2011. Hugo, Nebula and Locus Award best novel.

name: Old Man's War
description: 垂暮戰爭; John Scalzi, 2005; Morning Star, Mar 2012. Hugo Award best novel nominee.

name: The Forever War
description: 永世之戰; Joe Haldeman, 1974; Global Publishing, Jan 2017. Hugo, Nebula and Locus Award best novel.

name: Brave New World
description: 美麗新世界; Aldous Huxley, 1931; Howdo Publishing, Jun 2014.

name: The Invisible Man
description: 隱形人; H. G. Wells, 1897; Howdo Publishing, Apr 2018.

name: The Jungle
description: 魔鬼的叢林; Upton Sinclair (Pulitzer Prize winner), 1906; Persimmon Books, Dec 2014.

name: A Delicate Truth
description: 脆弱的真相; John le Carré, 2013; ECUS Publishing, May 2014.

name: Dear Life
description: 親愛的人生：諾貝爾獎得主艾莉絲．孟若短篇小說集2; Alice Munro (Nobel Prize winner), 2013; ECUS Publishing, Dec 2013. I translated 6 of the 14 stories.

name: The View from Castle Rock
description: 城堡岩海景：諾貝爾獎得主艾莉絲•孟若短篇小說集6; Alice Munro (Nobel Prize winner), 2006; ECUS Publishing, Oct 2014.

name: Open Secrets
description: 公開的祕密：諾貝爾獎得主艾莉絲•孟若短篇小說集12; Alice Munro (Nobel Prize winner), 1994; ECUS Publishing, Oct 2015.

name: Dangerous Women
description: 危險女人; edited by George R. R. Martin and Gardner Dozois, 2013; Global Publishing, Aug 2015. 21 stories, including a prequel of A Song of Ice and Fire.

name: Pump Six and Other Stories
description: 六號抽水站; Paolo Bacigalupi, 2008; Morning Star, Apr 2013.

name: The Blade Itself
description: 第一法則首部曲：劍刃自身; Joe Abercrombie, 2006; Fantasy Foundation, May 2013. First book of First Law trilogy.

name: Before They Are Hanged
description: 第一法則二部曲：絞刑之前; Joe Abercrombie, 2007; Fantasy Foundation, Jun 2013. Second book of First Law trilogy.

name: Last Argument of Kings
description: 第一法則終部曲：最後手段; Joe Abercrombie, 2008; Fantasy Foundation, Jul 2013. Third book of First Law trilogy.

name: The Heroes
description: 血戰英雄; Joe Abercrombie, 2011; Fantasy Foundation, May 2014. Set in the First Law world.

name: Steelheart
description: 審判者傳奇：鋼鐵心; Brandon Sanderson, 2013; Fantasy Foundation, May 2014. The first book of The Reckoners series.

name: And Another Thing...
description: 銀河便車指南6：啊，還有一件事……; Eoin Colfer, 2009; ECUS Publishing, Jul 2016. The sequel and final installment of Douglas Adams' The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy series.

name: To Be a Cat
description: 突然變成一隻貓; Matt Haig, 2012; Ten Ppints Publishing, Mar 2015.

name: The Magicians
description: 費洛瑞之書: 魔法王者; Lev Grossman, 2009; Beam Books, Jul 2012. The first book of The Magicians series. (Note: the published translation had been heavily abridged by the publisher.)

name: Flashback
description: 閃憶殺手; Dan Simmons, 2011; Business Weekly Publishing, Jul 2016.

name: The Silent Corner
description: 無聲角落; Dean Koontz, 2017; Global Publishing, Jul 2018. The first book of the Jane Hawk series.
